doctor.name: Dr. Md. Sherajul Islam
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Sherajul Islam is a General Surgeon in Pabna. His qualification is MBBS, FCPS (Surgery), FACS (USA), FMAS (INDIA). He is a Assistant Professor, Surgery at Pabna Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Central Hospital, Pabna. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Sherajul Islam at Central Hospital, Pabna is 3pm to 8pm (Closed: Friday).
